ApproxsimClient.treeview2
Class TreeViewModel

java.lang.Object
  ApproxsimClient.treeview2.TreeViewModel
All Implemented Interfaces:
EventListener, TreeModel, ApproxsimEventListener
public class TreeViewModel
extends Object
implements TreeModel, ApproxsimEventListener

TreeViewModel is a model adapting the ApproxsimObject hierarchy to JTree requirements.

          Creates a new TreeViewModel with the specified root.

listen

public ApproxsimObject listen(ApproxsimObject approxsimObject,
                             int index)
Begins to listen to the provided ApproxsimObject if it is not already listened to. Returns the object as a convinience. Note that we only need to listen to non-leaf objects since childChanged takes care of notification of children changes.

Parameters:
approxsimObject - the object
index - the index assigned to the object.
